title: Target enrichment metaviromics enables comprehensive surveillance of coronaviruses in environmental and animal samples
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Sandra Martínez-Puchol, Maria Tarradas-Alemany, Cristina Mejías-Molina, Marta Itarte, Marta Rusiñol, Jordi Baliellas, Nerea Abasolo, Núria Canela, Abir Monastiri, Marc López-Roig, Jordi Serra-Cobo, Josep F. Abril, Sílvia Bofill-Mas
